actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the exclusion from taxation of interest earned on deposits which are used for residential mortgage lending purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income interest or dividends earned on savings deposits which are used by the deposit institutions for residential mortgage lending purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the exclusion from taxation of interest earned on deposits which are used for residential mortgage lending purposes.
